p: In our present study, twelve uridine-based esters with different side chain length and different groups 4– 15 were used as test chemicals. These compounds (mainly 5′- O- t-butylbenzoyl esters of uridine), as presented in Figure 2, were synthesized from 1 by direct method and well characterized earlier (Chowdhury et al., 2016). For comparative study, uridine ( 1), standard antibacterial antibiotic ampicillin and antifungal antibiotic nystatin were also used.
